chunks.title: CSS Exercise 5 - Design this Layout  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #37.mp4
chunks.text: In today's video, I will give you an exercise in which you have to design a layout.

chunks.title: CSS Exercise 5 - Design this Layout  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #37.mp4
chunks.text: You will have a lot of options to design that layout.

chunks.title: CSS Exercise 5 - Design this Layout  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #37.mp4
chunks.text: But I want you to design this layout using all the things we have seen in this course.

chunks.title: CSS Exercise 5 - Design this Layout  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #37.mp4
chunks.text: If you accept this challenge, then write Challenge Accepted in the comment section below.

chunks.title: CSS Exercise 5 - Design this Layout  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #37.mp4
chunks.text: This will make me know that you are confident that you will be able to solve this question.
